post.body: I dunno? Crawl into a hole and cry to death because you have no heart and aren't 30 yet?
You poor deprived child. Some of the most awesome moments of HS were Halo/2 LANs at friends houses until the wee hours...
The twists of life. Oh well. We got senior year to make up for lost time. ^^ We should totally do LAN's in obieland... :D
Gah, hate you. My bro and cous keep raving about how awesome it is, but my big box capable of running the game is at home. :(
Zombies v humans? What game? L4D?
kinda lackluster. The only restaurants open in the future are fast-food joints. 5am, and Im waiting on the train home...
What's that about genres? As in, music/movie/other media genres? They can be kinda useful, for people who want similar things...
I am now sitting comfortably on a bus at 11:02pm, JST, that will, purportedly, take me even further east than I already am.
It is only the unending patience of the Japanese that allows me to survive here.
ProTip: If you ever find yourself in cut-throat market competition, and someone suddenly undercuts you by 1/3rd, you prolly shouldn't fight
If you like Zach de la Rocha(of RATM) at all, I suggest acquiring One Day As A Lion's EP. Oh my.
Bed time at 4:16 am, hoo-ha
I'm in your system! Crashing ur (price-fixed) markets! Eat it bitches!
I just realized that I work with Networking, so random LAN's are entirely feasible. /facepalm
Truly RATM's cover of "The Ghost of Tom Joad" is way better than Springsteen's original. Truth.
Jamming to the iPod as I geek it up at 3:00am with Eve in the background and way too many tabs in Firefox...
Havent done anything productive today. Maybe tonight...
Happy new year from the future!
I'm slowly fixing my sleep schedule! Managed to wake up at 1:30pm today! w00t!
I stayed up late looking at lolcats, of all things. I go to bed at 4am, again. I failed my promise to sleep early tonight. >_>
